summary: A key component of the government’s ability to deal with cyber threats is a right-sized and effective federal and contractor cyber workforce. To plan well, agencies need to accurately track their cyber workforce resources. They must also evaluate their efforts to build and maintain cyber workforces. However, most of the 23 agencies in our review couldn’t tell us the size and cost of their cyber...
title: Cyber Workforce: Actions Needed to Improve Size and Cost Data
